xdi2.core

Interface ContextNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<ContextNode>, Node, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractContextNode, DummyContextNode, JSONContextNode, KeyValueContextNode, MemoryContextNode, WrappedContextNode

    public interface ContextNode
extends Node, Comparable<ContextNode>
    This interface represents a context node in an XDI graph.
    Author:
    markus

    • Method Detail

      • isRootContextNode

        boolean isRootContextNode()
        Checks if this context node is the root context node.
        Returns:
        True, if this context node is the root context node.

      • isLeafContextNode

        boolean isLeafContextNode()
        Checks if this context node is a leaf context node.
        Returns:
        True, if this context node is a leaf context node.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the context node. This is equivalent to calling delContextNodes(), delRelations() and delLiteralNode().

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the context node is empty. This is equivalent to calling ! ( containsContextNodes() || containsRelations() || containsLiteralNode() ).

      • setContextNode

        ContextNode setContextNode(XDIArc XDIarc)
        Creates a new context node and adds it to this context node, or returns an existing context node.
        Parameters:
        XDIarc - The arc of the new or existing context node.
        Returns:
        The newly created or existing context node.

      • getContextNode

        ContextNode getContextNode(XDIArc XDIarc,
                           boolean subgraph)
        Returns the context node with a given arc.
        Parameters:
        XDIarc - The arc of the context node.
        subgraph - This is simply a hint to the implementation whether child context nodes will subsequently be requested. Implementations may or may not actually use this parameter.
        Returns:
        The context node with the given arc, or null.

      • getContextNode

        ContextNode getContextNode(XDIArc XDIarc)
        Returns the context node with a given arc.
        Parameters:
        XDIarc - The arc of the context node.
        Returns:
        The context node with the given arc, or null.

      • getContextNodes

        ReadOnlyIterator<ContextNode> getContextNodes()
        Returns the context nodes under this context node.
        Returns:
        An iterator over context nodes.

        Returns all context nodes under this context node.
        Returns:
        An iterator over context nodes.

        Returns:
        An iterator over leaf context nodes.

      • containsContextNode

        boolean containsContextNode(XDIArc XDIarc)
        Checks if a context node with a given arc exists under this context node.
        Parameters:
        XDIarc - The arc to look for.
        Returns:
        True if this context node has a context node with the given arc.

      • containsContextNodes

        boolean containsContextNodes()
        Checks if this context node has one or more context nodes.
        Returns:
        True if this context node has context nodes.
